replies.author: @killzone866
replies.text:
@Ray she absolutely was. She sought out Clark and was trying really really hard to get her to react and could not. 

If Reese hit a shot in Clarks face or blocked the shit out of her and then did the "you cant see me" it would have been awesome, but they had basically already won the game, and it became super lame.

replies.author: @killzone866
replies.text:
@Ray i gave you the context and you dont want to hear it. Thats fine. 

When Doncic gets in Bookers face that is lame. 

When a boxer knocks someone out they are obviously going to celebrate. Basketball is a  team sport, its lame to seek out an opponent that trash talked you when you are winning they arent near you while you do it. Its especially lame when you try really really hard to force a reaction. 

Hilariously i only saw the images initially so i didnt get why people were mad, then i saw the video and went thats lame as hell.

Switch the positions and i would have the same thoughts. If Clark did that when they were winning and she sought it and didnt get the reaction she wanted it would also be lame as hell.

author: @DeanSwiatek
text:
I have always hated when people do that stuff personally.

Also there‚Äôs a lot of racism around Angel Reese‚Äôs response to Jill Biden‚Äôs comments about inviting both teams which is honestly insulting. I‚Äôm disappointed she caved in and decided not to stay home.

I was rooting for Iowa for the sole reason that Caitlin Clark was ridiculous. She literally carried the team - if she didn‚Äôt score the basket she probably assisted on it or made a defensive play to set it up. I‚Äôd never seen anyone so dominant in men‚Äôs or women‚Äôs basketball before. But one player can‚Äôt win em all I guess.
